statements: SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_id, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_expression_data GROUP BY gene_id;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 50 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 3 ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id > 100 AND expression_level < 30;
SELECT gene_name FROM gene_expression_data WHERE experiment_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND expression_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression, COUNT(*) AS count_genes FROM gene_expression_data GROUP BY gene_id HAVING avg_expression > 40 ORDER BY count_genes DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC
SELECT researcher_name, lab_location FROM experimental_metadata
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM experimental_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 10
SELECT gene_id, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5 ORDER BY gene_id ASC, expression_level DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data WHERE gene_id = 100 ORDER BY expression_level DESC
SELECT experiment_date, researcher_name FROM experimental_metadata WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT gene_id FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level < 0.3 ORDER BY gene_id ASC
SELECT * FROM experimental_metadata ORDER BY lab_location
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
SELECT condition_name, temperature FROM experimental_conditions WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT * FROM sample_info WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM gene_expression_data ORDER BY expression_level DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT gene_name, expression_level FROM gene_expression_data WHERE expression_level > 100 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT sample_id, experiment_date, condition_name FROM sample_info JOIN experimental_conditions ON sample_info.condition_id = experimental_conditions.id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT gene_name, AVG(expression_level) AS avg_expression FROM gene_expression_data GROUP BY gene_name ORDER BY avg_expression DESC;

SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) AS num_samples FROM sample_info JOIN gene_expression_data ON sample_info.expression_data_id = gene_expression_data.id GROUP BY gene_name HAVING num_samples > 5 ORDER BY num_samples DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM samples;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM genes;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol, gene_description FROM genes WHERE gene_id > 10 ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT sample_name, sample_description FROM samples WHERE sample_id IN (2, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY sample_id;
SELECT expression_id, gene_id, sample_id, expression_value FROM expression_values WHERE gene_id = 3 OR sample_id = 4 ORDER BY expression_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcher;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researcher;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment;
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM sample;
SELECT gene_name, gene_symbol FROM gene;
SELECT * FROM researcher WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researcher WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, researcher_name FROM experiment INNER JOIN researcher ON experiment.researcher_id = researcher.researcher_id;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM gene WHERE gene_symbol IS NULL;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_type, expression_level FROM sample INNER JOIN expression_data ON sample.sample_id = expression_data.sample_id WHERE expression_level > 0.5;
